title: Fart in a Jar
summaries: The Fart in a Jar is an accessory that allows the player to perform a double jump, accompanied by a farting sound effect. The Fart jump goes 10.5 tiles into the air, totalling 16.5 tiles when put together with the first jump.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the holder to double jump
statistics.Sell: 1
